name: Logic Pro Overview File
summary: Learn about .OVW files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: OVW files do not contain actual audio data. If you delete OVW files manually, the software will automatically regenerate them.

description: Visual waveform file created by Logic Pro, a digital audio workstation program; contains a visual representation of an imported audio file or audio data recorded with the software; used for showing track information on the audio timeline.
